Preparing data for gcamfaostat

2023-10-23

Source: vignettes/vignette_preparing_data.Rmd
vignette_preparing_data.Rmd

Metadata 

gcamfaostat_metadata()
FAOSTAT dataset processed in gcamfaostat
Dataset Code Dataset Name Exist_Local Exist_Prebuilt FAO update date FAO size
CB Food Balances: Commodity Balances (non-food) (2010-) TRUE TRUE 2022-08-25 1MB
FBSH Food Balances: Food Balances (-2013, old methodology and population) TRUE TRUE 2023-03-10 69MB
TM Trade: Detailed trade matrix TRUE TRUE 2022-02-14 454MB
OA Population and Employment: Annual population TRUE TRUE 2022-10-24 2MB
FO Forestry: Forestry Production and Trade TRUE TRUE 2023-09-05 15MB
QCL Production: Crops and livestock products TRUE TRUE 2023-03-22 29MB
PD Prices: Deflators TRUE TRUE 2023-08-16 1MB
TCL Trade: Crops and livestock products TRUE TRUE 2023-08-14 229MB
FBS Food Balances: Food Balances (2010-) TRUE TRUE 2023-05-04 50MB
RFN Land, Inputs and Sustainability: Fertilizers by Nutrient TRUE TRUE 2023-07-05 2MB
RL Land, Inputs and Sustainability: Land Use TRUE TRUE 2023-07-10 2MB
PP Prices: Producer Prices TRUE TRUE 2023-02-23 10MB
SCL Food Balances: Supply Utilization Accounts (2010-) TRUE TRUE 2023-04-26 59MB

Note that if Exist_Prebuilt is TRUE for a dataset, it suggests the raw data was saved in the Prebuilt data. And if Exist_Prebuilt is TRUE for all dataset, the package is ready to be built based on the Prebuilt data.The prebuilt data were generated using FAOSTAT data archived in Zenodo address specified in the FF_download_RemoteArchive function.
